TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlConsoleDataSource extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.WebControls.ConsoleDataSource
Public NotInheritable Class XmlConsoleDataSource Inherits ConsoleDataSource

Docs.summary: An implementation of the XmlConsoleDataSource object that generates data that is based on a specially designed XML configuration file.

remarks.para: The XmlConsoleDataSource object displays a hierarchical structure of actions to the author. This control is independent of the user interface (UI), which means that any UI can be developed to read this ConsoleDataSource object and display the actions. Examples of UIs that use this object include the PublishingMenu and QuickAccessMenu. A single XML that specifies how the actions should be structured populates each XmlConsoleDataSource object. This XML file includes the definitions for each action..

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the object.

remarks.para: The configuration XML file is not specified upon construction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigurationProvider { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ConfigurationProvider : string with get, set

Docs.summary: A String that represents the configuration XML file used to populate the object
Docs.value: A string that represents the name of the XML configuration file.

remarks.para: All custom XML files should be found on the server at: http://servername/_catalogs/masterpage/Editing%20MenuXmlConsoleDataSource object with a file named "CustomActions.xml" set the ConfigurationProvider property to "CustomActions", and the CustomActions.xml file is placed in the folder specified above.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsBuiltInConfiguration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsBuiltInConfiguration : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines whether the file being used to populate this XmlConsoleDataSource object is a predefined or custom file.
Docs.value: A Boolean value that represents whether the XML file was predefined in the Microsoft SharePoint Foundation Publishing collection.

remarks.para: Set this value to True if the configuration file is a predefined file included with the product. Set this value to False if the configuration file is a custom file or is stored in the database.

Docs.summary: Populates the XmlConsoleDataSource object based on the configuration XML file that is specified in the property
